alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; East Cameron; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cameron and south central Calcasieu Parishes through 645 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Charles, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Grand Lake, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Heberts Marina, Holmwood, Carlyss and Hackberry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 24 and 29. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
